system.description: Also at 6th level you may perform the Lancer’s Leap, a special combat maneuver that only lancers gain. This maneuver does not count against your maneuvers known, and can be used with any other maneuver. Once you have used the Lancer’s Leap you must complete a short or long rest before using it, again. If you spend 3 exertion points before a short or long rest, the use of this ability recharges.
